name: Gravity Spark
description:
GRAVITY SPARK

Multidirectional Shooter Game

MOVEMENT -  W A S D (Restricted to one platform at a time)

ATTACK - I J K L (Available all the time)

DEFEND YOUR SHIP!

In Gravity Spark, you take control of EDSYO (Electromechanic Defensive System for Outer Space), your only hope for survival when an extraterrestrial life form turns hostile.

Destroy the aliens before they destroy your ship with the help of EDSYO, but beware: the gravity system has been damaged and you can only move through one platform at a time. We are counting on you!

Thanks for playing!

Project for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 - "Out Of Control"

Developed by Néstor Guadalupe García Ortega [BEWOLF STUDIO]

Special thanks to my family, friends, mentors and the Godot, M.U.G.E.N. and Power Items communities

. . . . .
